featured.title: Audient Wallet
featured.description: A voice AI-based Solana crypto wallet that listens to your commands.
featured.longDescription: Audient Wallet is a voice-controlled crypto wallet for the Solana blockchain. Users can send SOL and USDC using voice commands via a mobile interface. It features Whisper-based speech recognition, CrewAI intent handling, and secure key signing via WebSocket. The backend is powered by FastAPI and the frontend is built in React Native.

featured.title: Kiko Network
featured.description: A decentralized weather and air quality monitoring network.
featured.longDescription: Kiko Network is a decentralized IoT platform for collecting hyperlocal environmental data. Built using ESP32-based stations with PM and climate sensors, it feeds real-time data into a PostgreSQL backend and web dashboard. Designed for reliability and decentralization, it provides localized insights and transparency. The project won 5th place in the Radar Hackathon 2024 (DePIN track).

featured.title: Hardware Crypto Assistant
featured.description: An ESP32-powered voice interface for Solana transactions.
featured.longDescription: The Hardware Crypto Assistant is a standalone voice-enabled device built using ESP32, designed to perform secure Solana transactions. It captures audio from a connected microphone, streams it via WebSocket to a FastAPI backend where Whisper handles speech-to-text, and intent is parsed via CrewAI. Once verified, the assistant signs and broadcasts transactions using a locally stored SECP256k1 private key.
